name: Storm Giant
description: Storm Giants are towering and majestic beings, often seen governing the forces of storms and lightning. They wield massive weapons and have an innate connection to storm-related magic.
memorable: Commands the weather, summoning storms and lightning at will, and displays immense physical might.
goals: Prefer isolation and contemplation, but can unleash devastation when provoked.
relations: Might be encountered with other giants or as guardians of powerful storms.
environment: Remote mountains or beneath the ocean.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength and magical abilities, with a versatile combat style.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes it somewhat vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Multiattack with a greatsword and powerful lightning strikes, capable of dealing significant area damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ability to summon storms and manipulate weather conditions within a 3-mile radius.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 19, indicating strong awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Notable proficiency in athletics, arcana, and perception.
additional_information: Amphibious, can breathe air and water.
Immunities to lightning and thunder damage.
Can communicate through its innate spellcasting abilities.
Possesses awareness through stormsight, allowing it to see through obscured environments.
spellcasting: Innately casts spells like detect magic, control weather, and can commune for magical insights.
test_queries: powerful storm creature of the ocean
magical being that breathes water and air
huge giant known for thunderous strikes
